content.rendered:
torqit Stainless Steel Snorkel

Give your vehicle access to cooler and cleaner air for optimum performance, while preventing engine damage from dust and water intake.

Torqit’s Stainless Steel Snorkel is a fully sealed, one-piece construction designed for maximum airflow and engine protection. Australian made for tough Australian conditions.

A snorkel elevates the air intake point on your 4WD, improving the quality of air reaching your engine for improved performance, efficiency and potential fuel savings.

If you take your 4WD off-road in dusty conditions or tackle water crossings, think of a snorkel as an insurance policy. It reduces wear and tear by protecting your engine from water and dust, and means less maintenance and a longer lifespan for your vehicle.

Why choose Stainless Steel

Every Torqit Snorkel is mandrel bent from 304 grade stainless. Here’s why…

Created from a single pipe which is mandrel bent onsite at Torqit, the one-piece construction eliminates all joins and ensures every snorkel is completely sealed. Internally, the consistent diameter and minimal bends provide your vehicles engine with maximum airflow. Externally, the streamlined design minimises snagging on bushes when heading off-road.

Tried and tested in harsh Australian conditions, 304 grade stainless steel offers greater rigidity than plastic. It maintains its strength in extreme temperatures, without corroding or warping. An added bonus- a stainless steel snorkel gives your vehicle a unique look which stands out from the crowd.

Advantages of a Stainless Snorkel

From its structural strength to its DIY fitment, discover the many benefits of a Torqit Stainless Steel Snorkel.

  • Enhanced performance: Optimise engine efficiency and enjoy potential fuel savings by improving the volume and quality of air reaching the engine.
  • Prevent engine damage and reduce maintenance: Prolong vehicle lifespan by reducing wear and tear on the engine when driving through dust and water, and reduce the frequency of airbox filter changes.
  • Heavy duty construction: Thick, mandrel bent stainless steel and heavy duty brackets offer high structural rigidity to withstand harsh conditions and extreme off-roading.
  • Choice of finish: Every snorkel comes with the option of a brushed stainless steel finish or powder coat in satin black.
  • DIY installation: Each snorkel is supplied with a detailed vehicle-specific fitting template, plus rust-free paint for the guard cut and a rubber pinch weld.
  • 5 year product warranty: Torqit’s snorkel comes with a 5 year warranty for peace of mind. It does not void vehicle/factory warranty.
  • Product compatibility: Fits alongside either a Torqit Stainless Steel Airbox or factory airbox. Also compatible with popular light bars and roof racks.
